original_title: WCW Superstar Series: Ric Flair - The Nature Boy
overview: Whether on the microphone or in the ring, Flair's outrageous style is unmistakable! AS the only 14-time world champion and the leader of the Four Horsemen, Flair is the quintessential living icon of wrestling. When the Nature Boy struts down the aisle adorned with the white-hot hair and sequined robe, you never know what to expect from this flamboyant king of the ring!
title: WCW Superstar Series: Ric Flair - The Nature Boy
